problem.markdown:
>>Which system, a braced frame or a shearwall or a moment-resisting frame, do you expect to deflect the most under a lateral load?<<
( ) Braced frame will tend to deflect the most (x) Moment-resisting frame will tend to deflect the most ( ) Shearwall will tend to deflect the most ( ) I don’t know
[explanation] Moment-resisting frames tend to deflect the most under lateral loads since they are fairly flexible systems created with long, slender elements. [explanation]
